Queen C Hair Extensions are 100% Remy Double Drawn Human Hair Clip In Extensions.  Offering three different collections and ponytails.  Have fine/thin hair? Or just want a little added volume? The AIRess Collection is perfect for you.  Want added length and lots of volume?  View our Crown Jewels Collection.  Are you the trendy type?  Our Balayage Collection is definitely for you.  
Queen C Hair Extensions are full and thick from top to bottom, giving you incredible volume and luxurious thickness.  All colors are multi-tonal, which will better match and blend into your own hair.  Instantly you have unbelievably stunning hair making you feel regal and bringing out your sensual side.
